text: avarkal tankal urutimolikku maru ceytatan karanamaka nam avarkalaic capittu, avarkalutaiya ullankalai irukacceytu vittom. Avarkal (tankal veta) vacanankalai avarrin (unmai) arttankaliliruntu purattukirarkal. (Namatu innapiyaip parri) atil avarkalukkuk kurappattirunta pakattaiyum marantu vittarkal. Akave, (napiye!) Cilarait tavira avarkali(l perumpalori)n mocatiyai(p parriya ceytiyai) nir atikkati kelvippattu varuvir. Akave, ivarkalai nir mannittup purakkanittu varuviraka. Niccayamaka allah alakiya panputaiyavarkalai necikkiran
